The goal is to win at least three tricks. Now, if the side that picks the trump fails to get three tricks, it is said to be euchre. The highest trump is the jack of the trump suit, called the right bower. Partnership making trump wins three or four tricks and earns one point. Lonehand wins three or four tricks, also earns one point. However, a lonehand wins five tricks, that's worth four points. Many euchre games are scored by rubber points, as in wist. Ooh, ooh! The first side to win two games wins the rubber!
